quotes0.quote: I've been called a recluse. There's definitely truth in that. I like to spend time alone.
quotes0.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes1.quote: 'Recluse' is a code word generated by journalists... meaning, 'doesn't like to talk to reporters.
quotes1.author: Thomas Pynchon

quotes2.quote: State the problem in words as clearly as possible
quotes2.author: Brian Eno

quotes5.quote: Art is a harmony parallel with nature
quotes5.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes7.quote: I want to be famous but unknown!
quotes7.author: Edgar Degas

quotes8.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes8.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes9.quote: Don’t seek for everything to happen as you wish it would, but rather wish that everything happens as it actually will—then your life will flow well.
quotes9.author: Epictetus

quotes10.quote: In your actions, don’t procrastinate. In your conversations, don’t confuse. In your thoughts, don’t wander. In your soul, don’t be passive or aggressive. In your life, don’t be all about business.
quotes10.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes11.quote: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don’t have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have.
quotes11.author: Seneca
